title: Transform MediCrew into Igloo-style immersive healthcare experience

requirements.text: Create an immersive landing page with full-viewport hero section featuring large bold text 'MediCrew — Intelligent Healthcare in Motion', subtle animated background with gradient shift or floating particles, smooth fade-in text animations, and a button with magnetic hover effect

quotes: Large bold text: 'MediCrew — Intelligent Healthcare in Motion'
Subtle animated background (gradient shift or floating particles)

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section occupies full viewport height
Text animates in smoothly on page load
Background has subtle gradient shift or particle animation
Button has magnetic hover effect that follows cursor

requirements.text: Implement minimal transparent navigation bar that smoothly hides and reveals on scroll
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation has transparent background
Navigation smoothly hides when scrolling down
Navigation reveals when scrolling up

requirements.text: Create smooth cinematic scroll experience with section snap scrolling, where each section (AI Medical Intelligence, Real-Time Device Monitoring, Doctor Alert System, Secure & Verified Professionals, Call to Action) transitions with fade + slide animations, layered depth movement, and subtle parallax effects

quotes: Each section transitions smoothly with: Fade + slide animations, Layered depth movement, Subtle parallax
Every section must feel like a new 'scene'

acceptanceCriteria: Five distinct sections scroll smoothly with snap behavior
Each section has fade and slide-in animations
Parallax depth effects are applied to background elements
Transitions feel cinematic and professional

requirements.text: Redesign patient dashboard with dark immersive background, floating glass panels with soft glow edges and depth shadows, logo positioned left, profile and device status right, large animated health status card in center, and two floating action panels for 'Book Appointment' and 'Health Analysis'

quotes: Two floating action panels: Book Appointment, Health Analysis

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard uses dark charcoal/midnight blue background
All panels have glass morphism styling with glowing edges
Health status card animates on load
Two action panels are clearly visible and styled as floating cards

requirements.text: Add a glowing circular Help Desk button in bottom-right of patient dashboard with soft pulse animation that opens a smooth slide-in glass UI panel featuring multi-step progress indicator, animated result cards with urgency color-coded glow, and an expanding map section with smooth animation

quotes: Map section appears with smooth expand animation

acceptanceCriteria: Help Desk button glows and pulses in bottom-right corner
Panel slides in smoothly when button is clicked
Panel has glass morphism styling
Multi-step progress indicator shows current step
Result cards animate in and have urgency-based colored glows
Map section expands with smooth animation when triggered

requirements.text: Redesign doctor dashboard with mission control aesthetic: slim vertical navigation on left, main area displaying grid of live patient cards with dark glass styling, glow edges, animated live vitals numbers, and mini line chart animations

quotes: Main area: grid of live patient cards

acceptanceCriteria: Slim vertical navigation bar positioned on left side
Patient cards arranged in responsive grid
Cards have dark glass styling with glowing edges
Vital signs numbers animate when updated
Mini charts show animated vital trends

requirements.text: Implement critical patient alert system in doctor dashboard where critical patients display subtle red glow pulse on their card, and an alert banner slides in smoothly from top with smooth notification animation

quotes: Critical patient: Subtle red glow pulse

acceptanceCriteria: Critical patient cards have pulsing red glow effect
Alert banner slides smoothly from top when critical condition detected
Alert animation is smooth and professional

requirements.text: Implement comprehensive design system with deep charcoal/midnight blue background, soft electric blue accents, subtle glass transparency layers, clean white typography, large bold headlines, thin elegant body font, generous spacing, and editorial style layout
acceptanceCriteria: All pages use charcoal/midnight blue as base color
Electric blue is used consistently for accents and highlights
Glass morphism applied to panels and cards
Typography uses large bold headlines and thin body text
Layout has generous spacing between elements

requirements.text: Add micro-interactions throughout the application including smooth page transitions, magnetic button hover effects, subtle scaling on hover, scroll-based fade-ins, animated counters, glass morphism layers, and soft shadow depth
acceptanceCriteria: All page transitions are smooth and animated
Buttons have magnetic hover effect that follows cursor
Elements scale subtly on hover
Elements fade in as they enter viewport during scroll
Numeric values animate when changing
All cards and panels use glass morphism styling

requirements.text: Create dark mode visual map mockup with glowing doctor markers, smooth zoom transitions, and floating info cards for the Help Desk and hospital locator features
acceptanceCriteria: Map has dark theme consistent with overall design
Doctor/facility markers glow with electric blue accent
Zoom transitions are smooth and cinematic
Info cards float above map with glass morphism styling

requirements.text: Optimize all animations to feel smooth, professional, and cinematic without being overwhelming, prioritizing polish over clutter to achieve an Awwwards-level digital experience

quotes: Animations must feel: Smooth, Professional, Cinematic, Not overwhelming
Look like an Awwwards-level digital experience

acceptanceCriteria: All animations run at 60fps without jank
Animation durations are balanced and not excessive
No animation conflicts or overlapping effects
Overall experience feels premium and polished

constraints: Do not use real-time WebSocket connections; simulate live data updates with polling or on-refresh
Do not integrate actual map services; create visual map mockups using custom graphics
Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use only React, Shadcn, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend
Do not use blue and purple color scheme; use deep charcoal/midnight blue with electric blue accents as specified
nonGoals: Implementing actual real-time data streaming or WebSocket connections
Integrating third-party map APIs or geolocation services
Building mobile-specific views or responsive breakpoints beyond standard desktop/tablet/mobile
Adding backend database migrations or schema changes
Creating admin-specific UI overhaul (focus is on landing, patient, and doctor experiences)

required: Abstract floating particles or gradient orbs for hero section background animation, subtle and cinematic (hero-particles.dim_1920x1080.png)
Dark mode stylized map visualization with glowing markers and grid overlay for medical facility locator (map-mockup.dim_1200x800.png)
Elegant health status icon illustration with glass effect for patient dashboard center card (health-status-icon.dim_256x256.png)
